title: Cr√ºe questions
content:
If you want a font that resembles the first one you could take [Bureau Agency](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225200/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=48&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=MOTLEY+CRUE) and skew it.   
   
And add the umlauts for authenticity...
author: pattyfab
